name: Final Embrace Horror
text: Your constricting attack has become stronger and more lethal.
prerequisites: Str 15, Int 3; naga, serpentfolk, or creature that has the constrict special attack; Final Embrace; base attack bonus +6.
benefit: A creature that takes damage from your constrict attack is also shaken until the start of your next turn.
staminaText: When a creature is damaged by your constrict ability, you can spend 5 stamina points to sicken that creature until the start of your next turn.
text_zh: 很少有生物能活着离开你粉碎性的最终拥抱。
prerequisites_zh: 力量15，智力3，纳迦、蛇人或拥有＜紧勒＞特殊攻击的生物，最终拥抱，BAB+6。
benefit_zh: 当你的＜紧勒＞攻击对一个生物造成伤害，它同时也会陷入颤栗状态，持续到你下次行动开始为止。
staminaText_zh: 当一个生物被你的紧勒能力伤害时，你可以消耗2点耐力来让这个生物恶心直到你的下一个回合开始。
